comments.author: Anonymous
comments.body: This cartoon isn't a social commentary about Vino, is it?

comments.author: Greg
comments.body: "All eyes will be on Rasmussen's press conference this afternoon" I think Vino and the Astana boys have upstaged Rasmussen today: Vinokourov tests positive; Astana withdraws from Tour (http://velonews.com/tour2007/details/articles/12910.0.html)
